Localization.Name: Ixonia Gloves Coal
Localization.Description: When you're preparing for the tough day ahead, don't leave your hands ungarded. These gloves feature built-in knuckle plates, secured to the durable synthetic leather and cotton fabric with a strong polymer-reinforced thread.
